results.title: A New Mechanism in Steroid-Induced Osteonecrosis of the Femoral Head and the Protective Role of Simvastatin.
results.text_hl: This study aims to explore the role of @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ @CHEMICAL_Cardiolipins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002308 @@@cardiolipin@@@ metabolism disruption in SONFH and the potential protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@).

results.title: The effect of simvastatin induced neurotoxicity on mitochondrial function in human neuronal cells.
results.text_hl: The results of the present study have indicated evidence of @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial dysfunction@@@ and increased oxidative stress, resulting in increased loss of neuronal viability following @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment.

results.title: Phytoactive-Loaded Lipid Nanocarriers for Simvastatin Delivery: A Drug Repositioning Strategy Against Lung Cancer.
results.text_hl: Cellular studies showed efficient uptake by @CELLLINE_CVCL:0023 @@@A549@@@ cells, G0/G1 arrest, @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@mitochondrial@@@ hyperpolarization, @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@reactive oxygen species@@@ production, and enhanced cell death compared to free @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@.
